projects.name: Mapping robot microcomputer
projects.description: Robot that can traverse and map a maze using distance sensors, DFS algorithm and PID controlling.

projects.name: Computer construction (Snake)
projects.description: The creation of a microcomputer using VHDL and microcode for it to play a version of the popular game Snake.

projects.name: Sound localization
projects.description: Sound source localization system using various techniques based on signals received at multiple microphones.

projects.name: Floppy Borb A Java Game project
projects.description: A two people project using Java where a fun and casual game were created

projects.name: Tank AI game
projects.description: A group project where a capture the flag tank AI game were created using DFS algorithm and python libraries such as pygame.
